price: Kae Mose nso wͻ Nwoma no mu. Nokorε sε na ͻyε (onipa) a yatu no asihͻ, na ͻyε Ɔsomafoͻ (san nso yε) nkɔmhyεni.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخۡلَصٗا وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi mūsā innahu kāna mukh'laṣan wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
